<p>40a.4</p>rang gis rig pa log pa min/ /khyab par byed pa ma grub pas/ /rang gi rig pas rtogs bya ba/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rgyu med pa/ /yod cing rtag pa'i dngos po mthong / /glo bur ma yin mtshan nyid do/ /grub phyir gzhan la ltos med na'ang / /'bras bu yin te rang rgyud las/ /
<p>40a.5</p>rtog pa yis ni 'brel ba yin/ /rnam 'grel las ni gsal bar brjod/ /sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa ni/ /des na 'di ru 'khrugs pa med/ /lung dang tshad mas nges pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan mi pham gyis gsungs so/ /gnyis su med pa'i gsal ba nyid/ /rnal 'byor
<p>40a.6</p>mngon sum spyod yul la/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyir/ /rgyu nyid du ni rnam nges yin/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po sogs/ /'jig rten pa yis bkag pa ni/ /rnal 'byor mngon sum ma bkag phyir/ /kho bo cag gi 'dod pa grub/ /dngos po 'di rnams ma skyes
<p>40a.7</p>yin/ /zhes brjod ce na de bden min/ /ma yin brtags pa'i gzugs rnams nyid/ /'di yis bkag pa byas pa'i phyir/ /brtags pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis/ /chos rnams thams cad skye med yin/ /gzhan gyi dbang la brten nas ni/ /mi rnams kyi ni rnam rtog skye/ /
<p>40b</p>
<p>40b.1</p>dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa'i mdor/ /gang zhig dngos med rnam gsum po/ /de dang 'di ru mi 'gal bar/ /sum cu pa phyed kyis bshad de/ /dngos po gsum gyi rang bzhin ni/ /dngos po med pa rnam gsum gyis/ /chos rnams thugs la bzhag nas ni/ /dngos
<p>40b.2</p>po med par bstan pa yin/ /dang po mtshan nyid kho nas ni/ /dngos med slar yang gzhan pa ni/ /de yi rang bzhin mi 'byung bas/ /gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ni/ /de ni chos rnams don dam pa'ang / /gang phyir de bzhin nyid kyang de/ /dus kun du ni de bzhin yod/ /de nyid
<p>40b.3</p>rnam rig tsam yin no/ /sems tsam nyid du rnam bzhag pa/ /skye ba med par nga smra'o/ /zhes ni lang kar gshegs gsungs pas/ /'di dang yang ni mi 'gal lo/ /de ni ma skyes chos rtag de bzhin gshegs pa de/ /chos rnams kun kyang bde gshegs 'dra ba'ang yin/ /
<p>40b.4</p>mtshan mar 'dzin pas kyang ni byis pa'i blo can dag /mi bden pa yi chos rnams la ni 'jig rten spyod/ /gnyis su med pa'ang mi srid de/ /dpyod pa'i shes yul yin zhe na/ /ma yin rjes dpag yin phyir dpyod/ /des na 'di yis nges pa yin/ /dpyod pa yi ni yul nyid kyang / /
<p>40b.5</p>tshad mas ma grub par brjod do/ /rang rig mngon sum gyis grub phyir/ /tshad mas ma grub ci yi phyir/ /gzung bya the tshom lkog gyur la/ /dpyod pa rjes su dpag pa'i bdag /rang rig mngon sum gyis grub la/ /de la mkhas pa ci phyir 'jug//the tshom gtan tshigs tshig gi
<p>40b.6</p>phyir/ /dkrugs pa gtan tshigs rten ma yin/ /tshad ma'i mtshan nyid dang ldan la/ /de la sems pa mi srid phyir/ /'di la sogs pa rnam 'grel las/ /brtags kun la gnod yin par 'dod/ /gcig dang du ma dang bral sogs/ /gzung la sogs pa rigs mkhyen pas/ /
<p>40b.7</p>gzung la sogs par mngon zhen pa'i/ /rtog pa rang rig phyi rol med/ /'dir ni gcig sogs rnam dpyod pa/ /brtags pa nyid de rang rig min/ /sngo sogs sna tshogs shes pa la/ /shes pa'i bye brag gzhan min rten/ /bstan par mi nus de nyid ni/ /rnam par phye bas don du
<p>41a</p>
<p>41a.1</p>'gyur/ /zhen pa gsal bar gyur pa yang / /dus gcig tu ni 'jug pa'i phyir/ /rtog med dang ni rtog bcas dag /mngon sum gzhan la rmongs pas so/ /rtog bcas rtog pa med pa'i yid/ /cig car du ni 'jug phyir ram/ /'jug pa myur phyir
<p>41a.2</p>rmongs pa dag /de dag la ni gcig tu zhen/ /rang rig nyid ni ma grub bo/ /zhe na rtog pa dang bral yang / /rang rig rtog pa dang bral ba/ /mngon sum gyis ni grub pa yin/ /mngon sum rtog pa dang bral ba/ /mngon sum nyid kyis grub pa yin/ /kun gyis rnam rtog ming rten
<p>41a.3</p>can/ /so so rang gis rig bya kun/ /gsal ba de yi bdag nyid phyir/ /rang gi ngo bo gsal byed pa/ /ci ltar gsal bar mngon 'dod pa/ /de ltar blo yi myong ba yin/ /mngon sum so sor myong bya nyid/ /de ni de yi bdag nyid yin/ /'di dag thams cad rnam 'grel las/ /
<p>41a.4</p>gnod byed grub pa sgrub byed yin/ /rig bya rig byed dngos po ru/ /brtags pa bkag pa byas pa yin/ /lung gi bems po ma yin pa'i/ /rigs pa tsam la'ang gnod ma yin/ /ci ltar ral gri rang so dang / /ci ltar mdzub mos rang gi rtser/ /ci ltar mi chod mi reg ltar/ /
<p>41a.5</p>de bzhin rang gis sems mthong la/ /rnam shes bems po'i rang bzhin las/ /bzlog pa rab tu skye ba ste/ /bems min rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /'di nyid bdag nyid rig pa yin/ /bya dang byed pa'i dngos po yis/ /rang rig mngon sum 'di la min/ /gcig gi ngo bo cha
<p>41a.6</p>med la/ /gsum gyi ngo bo 'thad ma yin/ /mi rtag la sogs spyod pa ni/ /rang rig tsam la grub ce na/ /ma yin bdag la 'khrul med yod/ /phyir na dpyod pa 'jug ma yin/ /rang gi ngo bo kun ma 'khrul/ /zhes pas rgyan ni byed pas so/ /kun gyis sems dang sems byung
<p>41a.7</p>rnams/ /rang bdag mngon sum la brjod pas/ /gnod med rigs pa dam pa la/ /'khrul pa nyid du nges ma yin/ /rang gi ngo bos rtogs kun la/ /gnod pa srid pa ma yin no/ /don gyi rang gi ngo bo gcig /bdag nyid mngon sum yin pa la/ /tshad ma rnams kyis brtag bya
<p>41b</p>
<p>41b.1</p>gang / /ma mthong cha gzhan ci zhig yod/ /gzugs chos mthun pa mthong ba las/ /nya phyis la dngul rnam pa ltar/ /gal te 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis/ /yon tan gzhan sbyor mi byed na/ /de phyir dngos po mthong ba yis/ /yon tan mtha' dag mthong ba nyid/ /'khrul pas
<p>41b.2</p>nges par mi byed pas/ /sgrub pa rab tu 'jug pa yin/ /skad cig la sogs ngo bo ni/ /mngon sum gyis ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /de las byung ba'i rjes dpag gis/ /tha snyad rab tu 'jug par byed/ /mi rtag dngos las gzhan med de/ /de yang dbang pos sngar grub po/ /du ma'i ngo
<p>41b.3</p>bo brjod min te/ /brjod pa'i chos ni rtog skyes yin/ /spyi yi rten ni yang dag grub/ /'di dag spyi ru grub pa yin/ /de bzhin 'di yi grub nyid min/ /rjes su dpag pa grub phyir yin/ /gang du de shes ma yin te/ /'dra ba gzhan ni 'byung ba'i phyir/ /'khrul te tha dad mthong ma
<p>41b.4</p>yin/ /sgyu ma'i sgong gi dbye ba ltar/ /de ltar rtags med byis pa'i bar/ /ma 'dres phyi ma 'byung 'gyur bar/ /mthong bas yongs su chod pa yin/ /skye bos mar me sogs nyams pa/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi/ /nus la 'bras bu ma mthong ba/ /bar ma chad min
<p>41b.5</p>phyir rmongs pa/ /nges 'byed sgrin po med phyir ro/ /de nyid rnam par bzlog don du/ /rjes su dpag pa bsngags pa yin/ /blo gros chen pos mthong nyid las/ /rnam pa thams cad nges par mthong / /mngon sum gyis ni rab grub la'ang / /gal te rjes dpag gis gnod na/ /
<p>41b.6</p>mngon sum tshad ma ma yin phyir/ /rjes dpag tshad min cis ma yin/ /mngon sum gyis ni rtogs pa la/ /gal te gzhan gyis gnod pa ni/ /mngon sum tshad ma ma yin phyir/ /gzhan yang tshad ma ma yin no/ /mngon sum gyis ni grub pa la/ /tshad gzhan las ni ci ltar
<p>41b.7</p>yin/ /gnod pa med pa mngon sum ste/ /tshad ma gzhan gyi rtsa ba yin/ /tshad ma zhes pa med pa na/ /gzhal bya nges pa med pa'i phyir/ /cung zad cung zad kyis brjod min/ /gzhan la nges par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi nges ltar gzhan dag la/ /'dod pas nges pa skyed par
<p>42a</p>
<p>42a.1</p>byed/ /phyogs chos nyid dang 'brel ba dang / /bsgrub bya brjod las gzhan spangs yin/ /tshad ma zhes bya med pa na/ /bstan bcos tshig ni mi ldan phyir/ /'di la sogs pa'i tshig gi ngag /tshad ma khas blangs sngon 'gro yin/ /tshad ma med par dam
<p>42a.2</p>'cha' ba/ /rang gi tshig nyid gnod pa yin/ /kun rdzob tshad mar 'dod ce na/ /de nyid du yang de 'dod kyis/ /de kho na yi tshad ma yang / /rnam par nges par gsal brjod pas/ /mi shes don gyi gsal brjod kyang / /'dir gsungs gsal bar rgyan byed pas/ /don dam pa
<p>42a.3</p>yi tshad ma yi/ /mtshan nyid yang dag brjod pa yin/ /gnyis med shes pa'i ngo bo yi/ /sngar ni tha dad pa yi yin/ /don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don/ /dam pa'i don ni 'jigs pa med/ /'di brjod mtshan yang dag brjod pa'i/ /lung gis kyang ni nges pa yin/ /
<p>42a.4</p>thams cad dmigs pa 'khrul pa yin/ /de bzhin gshegs yid ma gtogs pa/ /rang gi rig pa la dmigs 'di/ /ma 'khrul pa ru rnam nges yin/ /rnal 'byor spyod 'dod de yin zhes/ /gzhan yin gzhan du brjod par gyis/ /dngos kun rnam bral yin zhe na/ /tshad
<p>42a.5</p>ma med par 'dir bsgrubs yin/ /med pa rab tu bkag pa la/ /mngon sum ma yin rjes dpag min/ /dngos po cung zad ma grub la/ /de dag nyid kyang grub min pas/ /ma yin dgag pa'ang kho bo yi/ /gnyis med shes las gzhan yod min/ /de nyid don dam nyid yin na/ /khyed
<p>42a.6</p>kyi sngar gyi ngal don med/ /tshad ma yi ni nus pa yang / /yang dag de yi bdag nyid yin/ /de yang mngon sum gyis grub yin/ /chos dang chos can dag dbyer med/ /gang zhig don byed nus pa ni/ /de ni 'di ru don dam yod/ /mtshan nyid de ni 'di nyid la/ /srid yin gzhan la med pa'i
<p>42a.7</p>phyir/ /'dus byas thams cad skad cig ma/ /brtan pa min rnams cis na byed/ /gang gi bya ba yang dag de/ /byed pa'ang de nyid du brjod do/ /chos dang chos can rnam dbye ba/ /dngos po kun las ma grub pa/ /kun du nyes pa mtshungs she na/ /ma yin kun rdzob bye brag las/ /don dam
<p>42b</p>
<p>42b.1</p>rnam par spyod pa la/ /de bzhin yang dag grub pa yin/ /don la de nyid de nyid min/ /kun rdzob rnams la dgag pa byed/ /rjes dpag dpag par bya ba'i don/ /'di ni tha snyad pa la gnas/ /tha snyad rtogs pas yang dag grub/ /dmigs par byas nas rtogs pa yin/ /ci ltar dbye bar
<p>42b.2</p>rab gnas dang / /shes pa rnams la'ang rnam dbye ba/ /chos can chos kyang snang ba yin/ /tha snyad de la brten pa'o/ /rang gis rig pa'i mngon sum gyis/ /grub nyid de ltar yin na ni/ /'bras bu rgyu yi dngos po 'di/ /kun du rnal 'byor pa yis rtogs/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos
<p>42b.3</p>po ni/ /tshad ma yis ni rab grub min/ /de phyir gtan tshigs 'di grub min/ /dngos po thams cad skur 'debs pa'i/ /rjes su 'gro dang ldog dag gis/ /gang zhig 'jig rten pas grub pa/ /de ni brtags pa'i rang bzhin las/ /gnod par byed dang sgrub byed grub/ /'di dag ci
<p>42b.4</p>las grub ce na/ /sngar nyid rang gi rig pa las/ /de las gzhan pa mi dmigs pas/ /de nyid 'di zhes nges pa yin/ /de phyir lan cig mthong gyur pa/ /de nyid gzhan du'ang de yin te/ /gang zhig rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos/ /'di ltar nyid du grub pa yin/ /gang zhig rten cing 'brel
<p>42b.5</p>'byung ba/ /de ni de nyid min zhes pa/ /bden min dpe dang gnod mi grub/ /'brel ba nyid kyang grub min phyir/ /gzugs brnyan la sogs dpe zhe na/ /ma yin rnam rig tsam smra la/ /rang gi sems las ma gtogs pa/ /gzugs la sogs pa ma grub phyir/ /de nyid rab tu snang la
<p>42b.6</p>sogs/ /kun rdzob nyid du bsgrub pa la/ /khyab pa nyid ni ma grub phyir/ /gtan tshigs ma nges pa yin no/ /yang dag gtan tshigs kyang brjod bya/ /thams cad kun rdzob grub pa'i phyir/ /ma grub la sogs skyon mi bstan/ /khyed la yang dag de yod min/ /dngos po kun la
<p>42b.7</p>skur 'debs pa/ /khyed la dngos stobs gtan tshigs med/ /dngos po med la gtan tshigs nyid/ /med ces rigs pa shes pas brjod/ /de don smos pas sgra dag dang / /rtogs pa sgro btags bdag nyid can/ /rtags min rab tu grub don te/ /don las don ni rab grub
<p>43a</p>
<p>43a.1</p>phyir/ /rtog dang lung dag byed pa po'i/ /'dod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yin/ /dngos po'ang gzhan gyi ngo bo ste/ /de yi byed pa 'khrul pa yin/ /khyab bya'i dngos po ma grub la/ /khyab byed nyid kyang ma grub bo/ /gcig dang du ma sogs pa'i chos/ /log kyang
<p>43a.2</p>ldog par byed pa min/ /grub pa'i rang bzhin go byed pa/ /khyab par byed pa de nges pa/ /go bya'i rang bzhin de yi 'di/ /rang nyid log la ldog byed yin/ /de phyir de tsam dang 'brel ba'i/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ngo bo nyid/ /bzlog par 'gyur ba'am rgyu yis ni/ /'bras bu 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir/ /
<p>43a.3</p>de lta min na gcig log pas/ /ci ltar gzhan ni ldog par 'gyur/ /mi la rta ni med ces de/ /de bzhin ba lang med dam ci/ /dngos po kun rdzob tu grub pa/ /de ltar de log yin zhe na/ /don dam yang dag gnas pa'i phyir/ /kho bo cag gis 'dod pa grub/ /rtog pas sgro btags pa yi
<p>43a.4</p>chos/ /log na ldog pa ma yin pa/ /don dam ma yin ci ltar me/ /dro nyid de yi phyin log la/ /rang la gtan tshigs ma grub khyed/ /gzhan la grub pas bsgrub pa ni/ /grangs can ci 'dra'i nyes pa ni/ /de 'dra khyed la'ang 'gyur bas so/ /dngos kun rnam bral bsgrub bya dang / /gtan
<p>43a.5</p>tshigs de nyid yin zhe na/ /ma yin dngos kun rnam bral ba/ /rnam pa kun du ma grub phyir/ /rang gis rig pa'i mngon sum ni/ /grub pa la ni skur 'debs pa/ /mkhas pa gang zhig rang rig pa/ /de ni skur 'debs mtha' la brten/ /dam pa'i don gyi 'dod chags sogs/ /de ni grub
<p>43a.6</p>par 'gyur zhe na/ /de rnams kyi ni brtags pa'i gzugs/ /kho na bkag par 'dod pa yin/ /rtog pa yin yang rang rig sogs/ /'dod yin don du ma brtags phyir/ /brtags pa 'gegs par byed pa ni/ /'di ni bsdus pa'i lta ba yin/ /de bzhin de rnams de ltar med/ /gzung
<p>43a.7</p>sogs sgro 'dogs rang bzhin gyis/ /de rnams de bzhin gnas pa yin/ /bdag gzhan du ni sgro 'dogs pa/ /chags pa'i chos ni de dag nyid/ /log par sgro 'dogs med 'gyur na/ /bde sogs la yang 'dod pa med/ /de bzhin de la bzlog rnams la/ /rmongs min zhe sdang can ma yin/ /de med
<p>43b</p>
<p>43b.1</p>pas ni ldog 'gyur te/ /de byung ma lus nyes pa rnams/ /sangs rgyas 'dod chags zhe sdang skyes/ /gti mug skyes zhes brjod pa ni/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ /dpal ldan rdo rje dkyil brgyan du'o/ /mi bskyod la sogs rang bzhin gyis/ /zhe sdang la sogs bstan pa ni/ /rigs
<p>43b.2</p>yin de rnams rang rig ste/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin phyir/ /'di la bsal bar bya ba med/ /bsnan par bya ba cung zad med/ /yang dag nyid la yang dag lta/ /yang dag mthong na rnam par grol/ /yod dang med dang yod med kyang / /gang gis bsgrub bya cung zad med/ /'bras bdag
<p>43b.3</p>mi dmigs ngo bo ni/ /de yi gtan tshigs cung zad med/ /gtan tshigs tshad mas grub yod pa/ /gal te dngos zhugs cung zad med/ /de ltar gtan tshigs gtan tshigs min/ /mi yi 'dod tsam gyis byas 'gyur/ /skyes bu'i bsam pa'i dbang byas pa/ /de nyid de nyid min gnas
<p>43b.4</p>na/ /gtan tshigs der snang med par 'gyur/ /de ltar dngos po rten med phyir/ /rang la sgrub byed ma grub par/ /gzhan la grags pas sgrub byed na/ /grangs can pa yi lta ba 'ongs/ /ji ltar shin tu de mkhas yin/ /gzhan gyi don gyi rjes dpag ni/ /rang gis mthong don gsal
<p>43b.5</p>byed yin/ /gzhan gyi lung las mthong ba ni/ /sgrub byed ma yin don med phyir/ /gzhan gyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gis ma mthong yang gzhan gyis/ /mthong ba sgrub byed ces kha cig /de spang phyir bdag mthong ba'i tshig /de don smos pas sgra dag dang / /rtogs pas sgro
<p>43b.6</p>btags bdag nyid can/ /rtags nyid min par bsgrub don te/ /don las don ni grub phyir ro/ /rang gi rgyud bsgrub med pa na/ /khyed kyi thal 'gyur ci ltar yod/ /bsgrub bya gtan tshigs 'brel ba ni/ /grub pa de ni bzlog pa yin/ /rang bzhin dag gam 'bras bu'am/ /snang ba mthong
<p>43b.7</p>ba med nyid rtags/ /'brel pa de dngos grub yin na/ /rang la ci yi phyir ma grub/ /gzhan gyis kyang gzhan rtogs pa ni/ /mi rigs gzhan gyis brtags pa yis/ /thal ba dag ni gnyis 'brel las/ /gcig med na ni gzhan med phyir/ /thams cad kun rdzob smra ba yis/ /de las gzhan
<p>44a</p>
<p>44a.1</p>ni rtogs don du/ /rang gis mthong ba'i bsgrub brjod bya/ /gzhan du bsgrub bya mi nges phyir/ /rang rig mthar thug par gyur la/ /rtag pa mi dmigs pa yi phyir/ /yod dang med la sogs pa'i phyogs/ /med pa'ang 'di ru 'gal ma yin/ /ci srid dam bca' byed
<p>44a.2</p>'gyur ba/ /de srid de kun dog par 'gyur/ /rang gi sems nyid mthong ba na/ /rtsod pa brtsam par mi bya'o/ /yod dang med dang yod med ces/ /gang gi phyogs ni yod ma yin/ /yun rings su yang skyon brjod par/ /de la nus pa ma yin no/ /gal te dam bca' 'ga' bdag yod/ /de
<p>44a.3</p>tshe nyes pa 'di bdag 'gyur/ /bdag la dam bca' med pa'ang yin/ /de phyir nyes pa bdag la med/ /gal te cung zad dmigs gyur na/ /'jug pa dang ni ldog par 'gyur/ /mngon sum la sogs pa yi don/ /nyes pa de ni bdag la med/ /sgrub pa'i yan lag mi brjod cing / /skyon
<p>44a.4</p>mi brjod pa gnyis po dag /'di ltar tshar gcad gnas yin par/ /mkhas pas rtsod pa'i rigs pa las/ /rtsod pa rtsom na 'di min par/ /bltas te rtsod pa pham gyur phyir/ /dam bca' 'am sgrub byed ma brjod phyir/ /sgrub byed ma yin phyir yang ngo / /don gyis don rtogs phyir don la/ /
<p>44a.5</p>phyogs dang gtan tshigs brjod nus med/ /des na de dag rang nyid la/ /sgrub byed gnas pa yod ma yin/ /de yi phyogs tshig smra ba po'i/ /mngon par 'dod pa ston par byed/ /tshad yin de las the tshom dag /skye phyir dngos su sgrub byed min/ /bsgrub par bya ba brjod pa yis/ /brgyud
<p>44a.6</p>pa yis kyang nus pa med/ /gtan tshigs brjod pa'ang rang nyid dag /nus pa med kyang nus ston byed/ /tshad ma yang ni gnyis yin te/ /tshad ma dang ni lung gis grub/ /de yi myong ba bzhi po yang / /tshad dang lung gis gnod pa'i phyir/ /blo ni gang du don stobs kyis/ /rjes su 'gro dang ldog
<p>44a.7</p>pa can/ /de ni rang dbang du 'dzin pa/ /de las dngos gzhan dbang po 'das/ /de yi ma mthong bdag nyid gzugs/ /rtogs pa 'di ni don gzhan rten/ /de la brten pas 'brel ba can/ /gal te de tshe rtogs 'gyur ro/ /rtogs pa'i rjes 'gro spyi yi ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis de tshe rtogs/ /de
<p>44b</p>
<p>44b.1</p>phyir thams cad lkog gyur pa/ /khyad par gyis ni rtogs ma yin/ /gang yang 'brel ba'i chos las ni/ /chos can la rtogs skye bar 'gyur/ /rjes dpag de ni lkog gyur gyi/ /gcig ni sgrub par byed pa yin/ /mngon sum lkog tu gyur dag las/ /gang gi gang gzhan srid ma yin/ /
<p>44b.2</p>de phyir gzhal bya gnyis nyid phyir/ /tshad ma gnyis su 'dod pa yin/ /rnam shes lnga yi tshogs rnams ni/ /bsams la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ /sems dang sems byung dmigs pa ni/ /drug pa zhes bya gnas pa yin/ /de la du mas bskyed bya'i phyir/ /rang don spyi ni spyod yul yin/ /
<p>44b.3</p>chos can du ma'i ngo bo yi/ /dbang pos thams cad rtogs pa yin/ /de ni bsags shing 'dus pa yin/ /spyi de la ni dbang po'i blo/ /spyi yi blo yang nges par ni/ /rtog pa yis ni rjes su 'brel/ /don gzhan dang ni mngon 'brel phyir/ /gang rnams rdul phran gzhan ni skye/ /de rnams la ni
<p>44b.4</p>bsags pa brjod/ /shes pa skye ba'i rgyu mtshan yin/ /rdul phran rnams kyi bye brag kyang / /rdul phran gzhan ni med na med/ /de gcig nges min shes pa ni/ /spyi ni spyod yul yin par brjod/ /de la skye mched gcig la yang / /du ma cig car mthong ma yin/ /cig car gzung ba'i snang ba
<p>44b.5</p>ni/ /'brel med til sogs la ni cis/ /mgyogs pa 'di la bkag zin to/ /de rnams rim gyis 'byung ba la/ /rim min mi 'dzin cis ma yin/ /blo rnams thams cad dus mtshungs phyir/ /de la 'ga' zhig rim min snang / /gzhan yang rim pa ldan pa ci/ /de phyir don rnams 'dzin pa la/ /
<p>44b.6</p>rim min 'di ni thal bar 'gyur/ /gcig min phye ma leb sogs la/ /sna tshogs gzugs mthong ji ltar min/ /sna tshogs de gcig yin zhe na/ /de las 'di ches ngo mtshar che/ /sna tshogs gcig pa'i rang bzhin min/ /ji ltar nor bu'i gzugs yin te/ /sngon po la sogs dbye bas
<p>44b.7</p>kyang / /ri mo'i gding ba rnams dang mtshungs/ /de la yan lag can gyi gzugs/ /de bzhin gcig pu mthong zhe na/ /sngon po la sogs gsal na yang / /sna tshogs gzhan mthong sna tshogs mthong / /rnam pa mtshungs don dus gcig tu/ /blo ni gnyis pos mtshon pa yi/ /gcig ni
<p>45a</p>
<p>45a.1</p>rim yin don sna tshogs/ /gzhan ni rim min don gcig ci/ /blo nyid sna tshogs gzugs nyid phyir/ /dngos rnams sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/ /de dag yan lag min na cis/ /'di la tha dad yin par gnas/ /rigs mi mthun pas mi rtsom phyir/ /ri mo sogs blo sna
<p>45a.2</p>tshogs min/ /gzugs can min phyir ldan pa min/ /ri mor brtags pa rten pa yin/ /so sor sna tshogs ma yin pas/ /gzung ba rnams la rim pa'ang yin/ /sna tshogs blo yis bsregs min te/ /du ma gcig gis mi 'dzin phyir/ /sna tshogs don du gcig gir 'gyur/ /de phyir rtog
<p>45a.3</p>pa med par grub/ /don gcig tu ni rtogs na yang / /gang las tha dad mthong ba yin/ /rdul bzhin de don mthong ba min/ /de phyir 'bras bu mthong ma yin/ /kun ni lci bar mthong ba bzhin/ /de yi yon tan ma mtshon phyir/ /de la de nyid ma mthong ste/ /de yi 'bras bu gzugs mthong ba/ /
<p>45a.4</p>'di la sogs pa rnam 'grel las/ /yan lag can ni shes yul min/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang ldan pas sngon po'o/ /shel gyi sngon po snyam pa ni ma yin no zhes lung las mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid rtog pa dang bral bar shes so/ /du ba las ni mer shes te/ /chu skyar la ni chur shes shing / /
<p>45a.5</p>byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis/ /rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes/ /zhes rjes su dpag pa yin no/ /de lta'i dngos po nyer bstan pa'i/ /de yi bstod pa bstan pa'i phyir/ /tshad ma'i de nyid grub don du/ /rjes su dpag pa'ang bkag min phyir/ /sbyor ba mthong ba'i phyir yang yin/ /'di yi
<p>45a.6</p>cung zad skye 'gyur bdag /kun ni 'gog pa'i chos yin te/ /de ni dang por rnam mang pos/ /rjes dpag rten ni rtags yin te/ /med na mi 'byung mtshan nyid do/ /khyab pa rab tu bstan pa'i rtags/ /bsgrub byas brjod de de yang gsal/ /yang dag shes pa sngon 'gro ba'i/ /gang zhig skyes bu'i don
<p>45a.7</p>kun yin/ /de ni bstan pa'i 'bras bcas te/ /ci phyir khyed kyis nges ma byas/ /brtags pa ma dmigs pa yis ni/ /yongs su grub pa sgrub pa la/ /gal te kho bo'i yod med nyid/ /khyod kyis rtsod pa byas gyur pa/ /de tshe khyed la yod med nyid/ /rtsod pa shin tu thal bar 'gyur/ /khyod kyi rtag pa nyid
<p>45b</p>
<p>45b.1</p>yod pa/ /de nyid du ni med pa yin/ /tshigs bcad don ni ji lta bu/ /tshad ma yis ni grub ma yin/ /de yi don ni ma rtogs pas/ /cung zad rtsod pa don med yin/ /yod med ces pa'ang brtags ldan nyid/ /spyod 'di sdug bsngal nyer zhi min/ /yod ces pa ni rtag par 'dzin/ /med ces pa ni chad lta
<p>45b.2</p>yin/ /mtha' gnyis la gnas de yi phyir/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ma yin/ /nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams/ /khyed la med par thal bar 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal nye bar zhi med par/ /smra ba yod sogs lta ba yin/ /nyon mongs tsam zhig spangs pa yang / /yod dang med nyid lta ba yang / /
<p>45b.3</p>sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar bshad/ /nyan thos rnams la drang srong gi/ /de nyid shes pas 'gro skyob la/ /thar pa'i mtshan ni rnam gsum nyid/ /med na mi 'byung nges pa'i phyir/ /thar pa'i thig le las gsungs pa/ /rgyu gsum las ni 'byung ba yin/ /las dang lus ngag yod na yang / /sa bon
<p>45b.4</p>gcig pu med pas na/ /myu gu bzhin du skye ma yin/ /'di nyid la ni bsams nas ni/ /thams cad kun rdzob smra ba yi/ /don dam par yod med par ni/ /kun rdzob la yang rigs ma yin/ /ci ltar de bzhin yod ces gsungs/ /rig pa shes pas rigs ma yin/ /de med na ni spyod med par/ /
<p>45b.5</p>skye bo thams cad thal bar 'gyur/ /gang gis de nyid bsgribs pa dang / /gang la bsgrib par 'dod pa yang / /don dam par yod med pas na/ /ji ltar gang la gang gis bsgribs/ /ji ltar khyod kyi kun rdzob kyi/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu nges pa yin/ /de bzhin kho bo cag gi yang / /de tshe gyur na'ang
<p>45b.6</p>nga nyams shing / /don dam yod par ma grub pas/ /nyan thos zhe na de rigs min/ /yang dag bdag nyid can de ni/ /mngon sum gyis ni grub pa'i phyir/ /de lta yin na thams cad kyi/ /thams cad 'bras bur 'gyur zhe na/ /lan yang khyod dang mtshungs pa yin/ /kho bo dang mnyam 'gyur ba
<p>45b.7</p>ste/ /'di nyid thugs la bzhag nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so/ /gang zag lta ba mchog yin te/ /nyes gzung stong pa nyid ma yin/ /de ni nyes par gzung ba la/ /nyes pa mang por thal bar 'gyur/ /yang dag skur 'debs shes bya la/ /rmongs yin de rnams gzhan du
<p>46a</p>
<p>46a.1</p>min/ /de nyid yod pa bsgrub bya yin/ /zhes na kun rdzob smra dang mtshungs/ /don dam pa yi cha bsten pa/ /rang bzhin cung zad yod ma yin/ /sgrub byed gnod byed ma mthong bas/ /de ltar the tshom rigs pa yin/ /de nyid yod pa gnyis med pa/ /nges par gyur pa ma yin
<p>46a.2</p>no/ /gnod byed med pa nyid kyang 'dir/ /'grel pa byed pas gsal bar brjod/ /thams cad kun rdzob smra ba yi/ /gang 'di cung zad zhes pa mtha'/ /bstan bcos byed las 'di yis ni/ /dngos su thob phyir skyes bu tshad/ /de don de nyid bstan pa dang / /tshig gi rje yis bskul ba'ang de/ /
<p>46a.3</p>de yi 'dod las 'das gang yang / /de ni 'ga' yis brjod pa yin/ /'chang byed gzhan gyi skyon yin te/ /'di ni gzhung don gzhan rtogs pa/ /ci ltar 'di don bshad pa ni/ /blo gsal rnams kyis nges pa yin/ /de bzhin de yi 'dod dang 'di/ /sus kyang 'gal ba mthong ma yin/ /de
<p>46a.4</p>'dod las rgal 'di rnams ni/ /sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs pas/ /phyi don gnyis su med rtogs pa/ /tshad ma lung gis nges pa'i phyir/ /gang du gzung ba'i snang ba 'di/ /brtags yin de nyid ma yin no/ /gsal ba nyid kyi zhen pa yang / /'khrul pa nyid ces brjod pa yin/ /nang
<p>46a.5</p>gi shes bya'i ngo bo gang / /phyi rol ltar snang gang yin pa/ /de bden min pa des na med/ /de nyid las ni phyir shes bya/ /de la ltos pa'i myong ba yang / /'dod pas byed pa po yi gzugs/ /de ni med phyir myong ba la/ /gnyis so zhes ni rnam par phye/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i ye shes la/ /rnam pa
<p>46a.6</p>thams cad snang ba yin/ /'jig rten spros pa thams cad la/ /bden pa cung zad yod ma yin/ /ji ltar zhe na/ de yis gzung min des ni 'dzin pa min/ /shes pa gzhan gyi gzung bya nyid kyis stong / /de lta na yang shes pa'i rang bzhin gsal/ /mngon sum phyogs ni khyod kyis gsal bar
<p>46a.7</p>byung / /gzhan ni myong bya'i blo yod min/ /de yi myong ba gzhan yod min/ /gzung dang 'dzin dang bral ba'i phyir/ /rang gis de nyid gsal ba yin/ /'di yi 'bras bu zhes sogs pa/ /'jig rten pa yi tha snyad yin/ /dag pa'i 'jig rten ye shes kyi/ /gnas skabs na yang 'gal ba med/ /
<p>46b</p>
<p>46b.1</p>yongs su grub pa'i dngos po yod/ /dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa/ /sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs nyid/ /sems tsam nyid la yod ma yin/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas dang ni/ /gang rnams sems la shes ma yin/ /sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs la/ /mi mkhas de
<p>46b.2</p>rnams dpyod par byed/ /yod dang med dang gnyis med mtha'/ /ji srid sems kyi spyod yul yin/ /spyod yul rnam par spangs pa yis/ /yang dag sems ni 'gag pa yin/ /yul ni 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir/ /'gog yin med pa ma yin te/ /ci ltar 'phags pa'i spyod yul du/ /de
<p>46b.3</p>bzhin nyid kyi skabs na yod/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid mtha'/ /mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/ /yid kyi rang bzhin sku sna tshogs/ /nga yis rnam grangs bstan pa yin/ /brtan dang rtag dang de nyid dang / /rigs dang dngos po'i rang bzhin dang / /de bzhin nyid kyi sems bor ba/ /
<p>46b.4</p>brtags pa dang ni rnam bral ba/ /gal te dngos med dag mi 'gyur/ /gang gi nyon mongs pa yang min/ /gang las sems ni dag pa dang / /nyon mongs pa yang skye ba yin/ /de phyir dngos po de nyid 'gyur/ /rnam dag 'phags pa'i spyod yul yin/ /sems ni rkyen las byung ba ste/ /rnam par rtog
<p>46b.5</p>dang rnam bral ba/ /sgyu sogs rmi lam dang 'dra ba/ /rnal 'byor pas mthong grol bar 'gyur/ /sems tsam la ni brten nas su/ /phyi rol shes bya'i ngo bo min/ /de bzhin nyid la dmigs nas ni/ /sems tsam las kyang bzla bar bya/ /sems tsam las ni bzlas nas su/ /snang ba med la
<p>46b.6</p>bzla bar bya/ /snang med gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /de yis theg pa chen po mthong / /sems tsam snang ba med pa dang / /gnas dang de bzhin sangs rgyas sa/ /'di dag sangs rgyas kyis gsungs te/ /gsung dang gsung bar 'gyur ba'ang yin/ /sems ni sa bdun po rnams te/ /snang ba med
<p>46b.7</p>pa brgyad pa yin/ /'di ni sa gnyis gnas pa yin/ /lhag ma'i sa ni nga yi bdag /so so'i bdag nyid rig dag pa'ang / /sa rnams nga yi bdag nyid yin/ /dbang phyug chen po mchog gi gnas/ /'og min gnas ni rnam par mdzes/ /gnyis kyi rang bzhin bdun du 'gyur/ /sa rnams
<p>47a</p>
<p>47a.1</p>sems kyi rang bzhin yin/ /yongs grub des ni lhag mar 'gyur/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sa rnams te/ /snang rung sems ni ma shes pas/ /rtog pa gnyis po skye bar 'gyur/ /snang rung sems ni shes pa yis/ /rtog pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ /sems nyid sna
<p>47a.2</p>tshogs 'gyur ba ste/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed rnam par spangs/ /ci ltar byis pas rnam brtags pa/ /mthong ba rnam yin ma mthong med/ /chos lnga dag dang rang bzhin dang / /rnam par shes pa brgyad nyid dang / /bdag med gnyis kyi dngos por ni/ /theg pa chen po mtha' dag
<p>47a.3</p>bsdus/ /ming dang rgyu mtshan rtog pa ni/ /rang bzhin gnyis po'i mtshan nyid de/ /yang dag shes nyid de bzhin nyid/ /yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yang dag rtog//gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid yin/ /rgyu mtshan gang la ming gang yin/ /de ni brtags pa'i
<p>47a.4</p>mtshan nyid do/ /ming dang rgyu mtshan yang dag rtog /gang du de yi skye mi 'gyur/ /shes pa rnams la brda med pas/ /yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /gnyis med de bzhin nyid dang stong / /yang dag mtha' dang chos nyid dang / /rtog pa med par ngas bstan pa/ /yongs grub mtshan nyid gang
<p>47a.5</p>de rnams/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong nyid mtha'/ /mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/ /ma skyes pa yang chos rnams kyi/ /rang bzhin don dam ma yin no/ /ci ltar gser gyi dag pa dang / /rnyog pa dang bral chu dang ni/ /sprin dang bral phyir nam mkha' dang / /de ltar brtags pa dag pa yin/ /kun
<p>47a.6</p>rdzob dang ni don dam las/ /gsum pa rgyu las skyes pa med/ /brtags pa kun rdzob tu brjod de/ /de dag spangs phyir 'phags spyod yin/ /mngon par shes dang dbang gis dag /ting 'dzin stobs kyis brgyan pa'o/ /yid kyi rang bzhin sku sna tshogs/ /rigs dang de bzhin gshegs dang dge/ /
<p>47a.7</p>so so rang rig dri ma med/ /de yi mtshan nyid rnam spangs pa/ /brgyad pa dang ni sangs rgyas sa/ /rigs ni de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ /ring du song dang legs blo gros/ /chos kyi sprin ni de bzhin gshegs/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs/ /lhag pa theg pa gnyis bsgrub yin/ /
<p>47b</p>
<p>47b.1</p>rang bzhin gcig pu bshad par bya/ /rtog pa rnam par shes pa spangs/ /'phags pa'i spyod yul bzang po ste/ /rang bzhin gnyis po rnam spangs pa/ /shin tu 'ang yongs grub ma yin te/ /brtags phyir gzhan las skyes ma yin/ /de tshe shes par byas dag pa'i/ /rang bzhin dam pa'i
<p>47b.2</p>don yin no/ /gang gi nub mo rtogs pa dang / /gang gi yongs su mya ngan 'das/ /nga yis cung zad rab bstan pa/ /'di dag bar na yod ma yin/ /so so'i bdag nyid chos gnas pa/ /thugs la bzhag nas nga yis brjod/ /sangs rgyas de rnams dang ni nga / /bye brag cung zad yod ma yin/ /
<p>47b.3</p>'di dag thams cad ma skyes pa/ /dngos po ma yin yod pa min/ /dri za rmi lam sgyu mar grags/ /dngos por snang yod rgyu med pa/ /rnam rtog gis brtags med pa ste/ /rtog pa med pa ma yin la/ /'khor ba ma yin myang 'das min/ /sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal yin/ /snying po de
<p>47b.4</p>bzhin gshegs dge ba/ /dngos po kun gyi skye ba ni/ /mtha' dang mtha' med rnam par spangs/ /nga yi shes rab rnam pa gsum/ /gang las de nyid rab byung ba/ /theg pa gnyis dang rnam bral te/ /shes rab snang ba dang bral ba'o/ /yod pa'i dngos por mngon zhen pas/ /nyan thos rnams ni
<p>47b.5</p>'jug par 'gyur/ /sems tsam nyid la 'jug pa yis/ /shes rab de bzhin gshegs pa dge/ /'di ni lang kar gshegs par yang / /chung ngu 'bring dang chen po yis/ /gsum po nyid du shes rab ni/ /brjod de gzhan du ma yin phyir/ /dbu ma'i rtsa ba la sogs par/ /brtags pa nyid
<p>47b.6</p>ni bkag pa'i phyir/ /brtags pa bkag pa 'di la ni/ /tshad ma lung gis grub pa ste/ /bden pa gnyis la brten nas ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos bstan pa/ /'jig rten pa yi kun rdzob dang / /don dam pa yi bden pas so/ /bden pa gnyis kyi dbye ba dag /gang gis 'di dag
<p>47b.7</p>mi shes pa/ /zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /de nyid de rnams kyis mi shes/ /tha snyad don la ma brten par/ /dam pa'i don ni ma rtogs par/ /mya ngan 'das pa mi rtogs so/ /stong pa nyid la lta nyes na/ /shes rab chung ldan phung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sbrul la bzung nyes dang / /rig
<p>48a</p>
<p>48a.1</p>sngags log par bsgrubs pa bzhin/ /des na so sor ldog 'gyur te/ /thub pas sems ni brtan bzhed pa/ /chos la dgongs pas 'di yi chos/ /dman pas rtogs par dka' ba'o/ /gzhan gyis mi shes zhi ba dang / /spros pa yis ni ma spros pa/ /rtog med sna
<p>48a.2</p>tshogs ma yin don/ /'di ni de nyid mtshan nyid yin/ /de phyir cung zad gzugs kyi tshul/ /rnam par rtog pas brtag mi bya/ /'di skad brjod pas brtags pa tsam/ /thub pas bkag par dgongs pa yin/ /yang dag skye dang 'gag pa sogs/ /dngos la gnyis pa yod ma yin/ /de med
<p>48a.3</p>na ni thams cad kyi/ /dgag pa grub pa ma yin no/ /'jig dang skye dang nyon mongs dang / /shes pa dgag pa ma yin te/ /byis pas shes pas gang rtogs pa/ /de ni dgag pa thams cad du/ /sgrub byed mi dmigs pa las yin/ /rang rig tsam zhig dmigs pa yang / /'dir ni gnyis po
<p>48a.4</p>mi dmigs yin/ /khyad par can dngos myang ba la/ /don gsal ba ni gzhan ma yin/ /de las khyad par can dmigs pa/ /de phyir de yang mi dmigs pa/ /de nas ma dmigs pa 'di ni/ /mngon sum bdag nyid kho nas rtog//rang nyid tsam gyis 'jug pa tsam/ /de med rnam gzhag go byed
<p>48a.5</p>yin/ /gzhan du mi dmigs pa las ni/ /don dam pa ni rtogs 'gyur na/ /gzhan gyis dmigs pa med pa nyid/ /de ltar na ni thug med 'gyur/ /mi snang nges par mi rung phyir/ /gzhan la gnas 'gog 'gyur ba yin/ /sems can gzhan la rtags can min/ /rnam rtog sogs 'grub mi
<p>48a.6</p>'gyur bzhin/ /'bras bu nges med can de dag /'di 'dra mi dmigs pa ru brjod/ /de ni shin tu lkog gyur la/ /yod dang med pa'i rnam nges min/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sangs rgyas/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin no/ /ming tsam dag tu brjod pa ni/ /bsal na sgra don brtags pa yin/ /
<p>48a.7</p>'di ni sgra don bkag pa ste/ /dngos po rnam par mi bzlog go/ /gang rnams la ni don nges pa/ /gzhan la'ang de bzhin gshegs par bya/ /brtags pa 'gag pa zhes pa 'di/ /lta ba thams cad bsdus pa yin/ /shes bya nyid du snang ba kun/ /rnam par brtags par 'dod pa yin/ /gang dang
<p>48b</p>
<p>48b.1</p>gang gi rtog pa yis/ /dngos po gang gang rnam brtags pa/ /'di ni yongs su brtags pa yin/ /zhes ni rigs mkhyen gyis gsungs phyir/ /gang zhig dbu ma rtogs nyid yin/ /sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dag//dor bas dbu mar shes par bya/ /de nyid gnyis med myong ba yin/ /gang zhig rten cing 'brel 'byung
<p>48b.2</p>ba/ /de la stong pa nyid du brjod/ /de ni nye bar 'dogs nyer len/ /de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung ma yin pa/ /chos ni cung zad yod ma yin/ /gang phyir de phyir mi stong pa'i/ /chos ni cung zad yod ma yin/ /sems tsam nyid de snang yod min/ /phyi rol don ni dor ba yin/ /rnam par rtog pa log pa yi/ /
<p>48b.3</p>lam de nyid ni dbu ma yin/ /sems tsam ma mthong nyid yod min/ /snang ba med phyir skye ma yin/ /'di ni dbu ma'i lam yin te/ /kho bo gzhan gyis brjod pa yin/ /yang dag ma yin kun rtog yod/ /de la gnyis po yod ma yin/ /stong pa nyid ni 'di la yod/ /de la yang ni de yod de/ /stong
<p>48b.4</p>pa ma yin mi stong min/ /de lta bas na thams cad bshad/ /yod pas med pas yod pas na/ /de nyid dbu ma'i lam yin no/ /dbus dang mtha' rnam 'byed pa las/ /'di yi de nyid rtogs par bya/ /de phyir ma lus 'phags dag dang / /'di ni mi 'gal bar bsgrubs yin/ /'chad pa po yis
<p>48b.5</p>gang phye ba/ /brtags pa 'di ni rigs min cha/ /lung dang rigs pas gnod pa ni/ /tshangs pas bzlog par mi nus phyir/ /rnam pa rnams ni rang rig yin/ /rang gi ngo bor gsal ba'i phyir/ /gcig dang du ma bral sogs kyi/ /gnod pa gzhan du bkag pa yin/ /sngo sogs sna tshogs
<p>48b.6</p>rnam shes la/ /shes pa'i khyad par gzhan mi sten/ /mthong nus ma yin de la ni/ /'byed byed don la ltung bar 'gyur/ /shes la ci ltar snang gang yin/ /de ni de la nyams myong 'gyur/ /de ltar sems kyi rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs gcig gi ngo bor 'gyur/ /gzung ba la sogs par zhen
<p>48b.7</p>gang / /'khor ba yin te gzhan min phyir/ /de dang bral bas myang 'das te/ /des na thams cad legs par gnas/ /gzhan gyi dbang gi dngos po ni/ /mtshan nyid las ni gnyi ga'i cha/ /brtags pa'i cha yis 'khor ba yin/ /yongs grub cha yis myang 'das yin/ /bdag dang bdag gi rnam
<p>49a</p>
<p>49a.1</p>rtog rgyun gyis ni/ /ngo bor dag gis der ni 'khor ba ste/ /dag pa de las phyin ci log pa na/ /ngo bo tsam gyis rnam par shes par bya/ /zhi ba dang ni srid pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /chos nyid kyis ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med/ /gang phyir gzung ba la sogs rnam pa dang / /bral bar thams cad
<p>49a.2</p>du ni rtag tu grub/ /so sor snang ba rang bzhin kun rtog las/ /thams cad kyang ni ci yang yod ma yin/ /sems las gzhan pa 'ga' yang yod min pas/ /bdag ces bya ba'ang gud na yod ma yin/ /kun rdzob tsam las 'khor ba ni/ /gzhan ni yod par ma mthong ngo / /de nyid kho na mya ngan 'das/ /
<p>49a.3</p>de lta na ni yang dag gnas/ /ji srid rnam rig tsam nyid ces/ /shes pa tsam la'ang mi gnas te/ /gzung ba gnyis kyi rjes 'jug pa/ /de srid rnam par mi ldog go/ /'di dag rnam par rig tsam zhes/ /de snyam du ni dmigs nas su/ /ci yang rung ste mdun 'jog na/ /de ni tsam la'ang mi
<p>49a.4</p>gnas so/ /nam zhig shes pas dmigs pa rnams/ /mi dmigs de yi tshe na ni/ /rnam par rig pa tsam la gnas/ /gzung ba med par 'dzin pa med/ /mi dmigs 'di ni bsam mi khyab/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i ye shes te/ /gnas kyang gzhan du gyur pa ni/ /gnas ngan len gnyis spangs
<p>49a.5</p>pas so/ /de nyid zag pa med dang dbyings/ /bsam gyis mi khyab dge dang rtag /'di ni bde chen rnam grol sku/ /thub pa chen po chos shes bya/ /de phyir 'di nyid smad bya min par mkhas pa rnams/ /rigs pa shes pas gzhan gyi don du dpyad par bya/ /blo gros phra ba'i mi yi spyod yul yin gyur
<p>49a.6</p>te/ /blo gros dman pa'i skye bo 'dod dang bral bar byed pa nyid/ /ces pa ni bsres pas bsdus pa dang shes par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams so/ /de nas zhes pa ni rigs drug gi gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
<p>49a.7</p>sku gsung thugs rnams kyi chos nyid ni sngar brjod pa'i stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bdag nyid do/ /de ston par byed pa'i yi ge rnams te byang chub kyi sems rnam pa drug gi tshigs su bcad pa'i ngo bo rnams so/ /e ma'o chos ni lung du gyur pa'i bstan pa gdul bya rnams la
<p>49b</p>
<p>49b.1</p>rab tu gsal ba'o/ /mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa dang lung gi yul rnams la de rnams kyis mi gnod pa'i phyir rmad du byung ba'i yul lo/ /de rnams kyang rgyu med pa ma yin te/ rtag tu yod pa la sogs par thal bar 'gyur bas/ rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir/ /rtag tu yod pa'ang med
<p>49b.2</p>par 'gyur/ /dngos po rnams ni res 'ga' zhig /'byung ba ltos pa las yin no/ /zhes pa'i rigs pas so/ /'di ltar yang de lta bu'i rtogs pa sngon du song bas 'di gsungs pa/ e ma'o chos zhes te rtogs pa'i ngo bo dkyil 'khor pa'i bdag nyid ni 'dir dge 'dun no/ /de yang yang dag
<p>49b.3</p>par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas las gzhan rnams la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir gsungs pa/ e ma'o sangs rgyas zhes te/ yang dag de bzhin nyid bden gang / /yang dag rtogs pa brtan pa che/ /chos kun yang dag rtogs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sangs rgyas de brjod do/ /zhes pas dkyil
<p>49b.4</p>'khor gyi bdag po'i sangs rgyas ni 'dir ston pa po yin no/ /dag pa ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa thams cad kyi dri ma dang bral bas so/ /de kho na nyid ni tshad ma dang lung gis grub pas phyin ci ma log pa'i de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o/ /
<p>49b.5</p>don ni gang gis dgongs pa ste/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i bdag nyid lam du gyur pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu mtshan gyi sems de la de skad ces bya'o/ /ji ltar zhe na/ gang gi phyir dag pa ni sbyor ba ji lta bar 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral bas la sogs pa'o/ /don ni dgos pa rnams yin te
<p>49b.6</p>de kho na nyid thob par byed pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces brjod do/ /rgyu min rgyu yi dngos po yis/ /'bras min 'bras bu'i dngos po yis/ /de ni rgyu 'bras dngos po las/ /rang gi sems ni rab gsal ba/ /zhes pa'i rigs pas rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i sems kyi rgyun dbye ba med pa'i phyir dang / 
<p>49b.7</p>rgyu thos pa la sogs pa la gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ rgyu'i sgo nas 'bras bur gyur pa'i kun du bzang po la me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa yin no/ /chos kyi bdag med pa las byung ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis te/ de nyid kyi phyir na sangs rgyas byang chub rdzogs mdzad pa'o/ /
<p>50a</p>
<p>50a.1</p>gang du gang zhig sgra don 'dzin/ /de la de shes rtog pa yin/ /rang bzhin la ni sgra don med/ /de la ma lus mngon sum 'dod/ /ces pa'i rigs pas rtog pa med pa'o/ /de ltar de dmigs pa yin na sgra'i don yin te/ de lta na yang rtog pa dang bcas pa yin no zhe na/ ma yin
<p>50a.2</p>te gang gi phyir/ blo la myong bya gzhan min te/ /de la myong ba gzhan yod min/ /gzung dang 'dzin dang bral ba'i phyir/ /rang gi de nyid gsal ba yin/ /zhes pas dmigs pa med pa'o/ /so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid kyis gang las nges pa sems can rnams la bzang ba ni dge
<p>50a.3</p>bar 'gyur ba ste de la de skad ces bya'o/ /gang las ci ltar zhe na/ gang gi phyir mtho ris dang thar pa'i don thams cad gang las 'gyur ba de la de skad ces bya'o/ /ji ltar zhe na/ gang gi phyir byang chub kyi sems kyis yon tan gyi tshogs ma lus pa thob par byed pas rab tu bskor ba'o/ /'di
<p>50a.4</p>dag thams cad ci ltar skye zhe na/ gang gi phyir byang chub kyi don du spyod pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rnam pa bcu po dkar po'i yon tan gyi ngo bo gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir chen po yang yin te 'di chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo des dngos po thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir sngar
<p>50a.5</p>bzhin du rdo rje yang yin te bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can yin te/ kun du bzang po'i bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i dri ma dang bral ba'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir sangs
<p>50a.6</p>rgyas byang chub kyi don ston par byed pa ste/ thob par byed pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub kyi sems ston par byed pa'i gzhung yongs su gcod par byed pa'i le'u'o/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan gyi le'u gnyis
<p>50a.7</p>pa'o// //de nas zhes pa ni gang byang chub kyi sems drug po de ston pa nyid las kyang gzhan yin la/ de las gzhan pa yang bdag yin no zhes gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pa nyid ni nam mkha'i khams
<p>50b</p>
<p>50b.1</p>thams cad du khyab pa'i sprin yin te/ de'i bkod pa ni phyogs bcu'i gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa sprul cing spros pa'o/ /de nyid rdo rje yin pa de la de skad ces bya ste/ brtan zhing snying po khong stong med/ /stong pa nyid la rdo rjer brjod/ /ces gsungs pas so/ /stong
<p>50b.2</p>pa nyid kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems ni rdo rje ste/ de'i bdag nyid yin pas sngar bzhin du bkod pa gang gis brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston par byed pa'i le'us gzhung yongs su gcod par byed pas de la de skad ces bya'o/ /sngar brjod pa'i rnam par rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir gsungs pa/ oM zhes
<p>50b.3</p>pa ni 'di ltar 'di yin no/ /gzhan ni/ mi tshig pa dang mi 'jigs pa'i/ /dpal ldan oM ni yang dag ldan/ /zhes so/ /stong pa nyid ni ye shes yin la de nyid rdo rje yin te/ de'i rang bzhin ni dngos po yin la rang gi ngo bo de nyid kyi bdag nyid gang rnal 'byor pa'i rang gi ngo bo de nga yin te/ de bzhin
<p>50b.4</p>du'o/ /dngos las stong nyid gzhan ma yin/ /de med par yang dngos po med/ /shes las stong nyid ces bya ba/ /cung zad gzhan ni yod ma yin/ /gang phyir dben pa can las ni/ /dben pa tha dad nyid mi 'dod/ /gnyis po stong nyid ye shes te/ /gzhan du grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /gnyis
<p>50b.5</p>po med dang rnam bral ba/ /gnyis kyi bdag nyid thal bar 'gyur/ /zhes 'phags pas gsungs pas so/ /'di ni byang chub kyi sems byin gyis rlob pa'i sngags so/ /lhag ma yang mdor bsdus pa'i rnam par bshad par kho bos brjod pas de nyid du rtogs par bya'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings
<p>50b.6</p>ni chos 'byung gi phyag rgya ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi khong gnas pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad de de las yang dag par byung ba'i dkyil ni snying po yin te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa len par byed pas dkyil
<p>50b.7</p>'khor ro/ /'od zer sprin gyi tshogs chen po ni sngar bzhin du 'dir sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyis 'bar ba yin te de dang mnyam pa'i 'od gsal ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rnams ni dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang sngon po'i 'od zer
<p>51a</p>
<p>51a.1</p>rnams kyis yongs su khyab pa dang / kun du yongs su zlum po ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag zlum po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga zhes pa la 'dod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams te de nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo des gzugs rdo rje la
<p>51a.2</p>sogs pa'i rnam pa yin la yon tan ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis goms par byed pa ste/ yon tan de rnams kyis khyab pa ni de'i rang bzhin no/ /mchod pa lnga ni me tog la sogs pa'am bdud rtsi yin te de rnams kyis brgyan pa'o/ /gzugs zhes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bskyed pa po
<p>51a.3</p>sngon du song ba yin la/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i lus so/ /sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dang ldan pa ste/ 'di'i dbang du byas
<p>51a.4</p>pas chu bo'i rgyun gyi rigs pas so/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'bras bur gyur pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'o/ /gzhan ni sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje yang ste phyag rgya chen por bsgom par bya ba yin no zhes so/ /mi bskyod pa yang phul du byung bas dam pa dang gtso bor gyur pa yin te/ shes rab
<p>51a.5</p>dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dri ma med pa bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa ni/ /bsod nams ye shes shes rab ste/ /gnyis yin brtson 'grus byams bdag nyid/ /bsam gtan bsod nams de bzhin shes/ /snying rje dang shes rab gtso bor gyur pa'i pha rol
<p>51a.6</p>tu phyin pa drug gi mtshan nyid bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis dang ldan pa zhes pa dang / 'od byed pa zhes pa yang seng ge'i lta stangs kyi tshul gyis sbyar ro/ /grub nas rtsom pa ni nges pa'i don du'o zhes pa'i rigs pas sngon po dang dkar po dang dmar po'i tshul gyis zhes pa la sogs pas nges
<p>51a.7</p>pa med pa'i kha dog brjod na yang rtsa ba'i zhal dang sku'i kha dog gi nges pa mdor bstan pa bor na 'byin pa'i rim pas kha dog gi nges pa gsungs te/ in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can ni mi bskyod pa yin te rdo rje sngon po'i phyag go/ /sems can thams cad kyi gti mug gi mun
<p>51b</p>
<p>51b.1</p>pa sel bar nus pa'i phyir 'bar ba chen po ste/ 'od zer rnams gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /mche ba sgur po 'jigs su rung ba de rnams rnam par gtsigs pa rno ba de'i phyir 'jigs pa yin te cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa zhe sdang rnam par dag pa mi bskyod pa'o/ /gang bcu gsum pa la
<p>51b.2</p>sogs pa de ru kha dog la sogs pa nges pa de/ don gzhan la ni brten nas su/ /don de nyid ni bzlas pa yin/ /zhes pa'i rigs pas zhi ba la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs la sogs pa'i kha dog la sogs pa'i nges pa bstan pa'i don du'o/ /rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang du byas te gsungs pa/ shel dang zla ba'i 'od
<p>51b.3</p>'dra ba/ /zhes te de la ji ltar shel la de yul dang dus dang nye ba'i dngos po'i gzugs brnyan shar ba de bzhin du me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag pa la dngos po ma lus pa lag mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du dus gcig tu rab tu snang
<p>51b.4</p>ngo / /ji ltar zla ba tshes gcig nas brtsams te ji srid du nya gang ba'i bar 'dir gong nas gong du 'phel bar 'gyur bas lhag pa'i yang lhag par sems can thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa dang / 'bru 'phel bar byed pa dang mun pa sel bar byed pa yang yin te bcom ldan 'das de yang dang por byang
<p>51b.5</p>chub kyi sems nye bar bzung nas ji srid du so sor mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de srid du srog chags ma lus pa rnams kyi yid tshim pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar byed pa dang gti mug gi mun pa sel bar byed do/ /de'i phyir dkar po'i dpe srid kyang 'dis khyad par can gyi
<p>51b.6</p>dpe gnyis gsungs so/ /ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /zhes pa dang / sna tshogs rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan/ /zhes pa 'di yang dkar po nyid bor te brjod ma thag pa gnyis po sngar bzhin du gnyis ka'i yang dbang du byas pa yin no/ /'bras bur gyur pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po yang rnam
<p>51b.7</p>par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba'i 'od yin te/ de ma thag pa'i de 'gyur nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che/ /zhes bco lnga pa'i tshig las phyag na 'khor lo bsnams zhes pa bor te thams cad du rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir tha dad pa'i tshig med do/ /'dzam bu chu bo'i
<p>52a</p>
<p>52a.1</p>gser 'od 'dra/ /zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan yin te gser btso ma'i kha dog go/ /sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'khrugs pa ni des 'khrugs pa bzhin du 'khrugs pa'o/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa/ /zhes pa ni cha dgu pa'i rdo rje rin chen te/ dpal khams gsum rnam par rgyal
<p>52a.2</p>ba las/ /rdo rje chen po rtse dgu ni/ /rin chen margad cha dgu pa/ /de nyid margad du brjod de/ /'od kyi rnam pa'i rin chen no/ /zhes so/ /pad+ma rA ga'i 'od 'dra ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /'bar ba ni ye shes kyi me'i ngo bo yin la 'dod chags snying rje chen po'i bdag nyid de/ de de'i bdag nyid du
<p>52a.3</p>'dzin pas de bsnams pa'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir sngar bzhin du 'dod chags rdo rje'o/ /'od zer lnga yi 'od 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni snga ma dang 'brel to/ /dkar po la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rnam pa'i 'od dang ldan pa de rnams thams cad do/ /don yod grub pa ni sna
<p>52a.4</p>tshogs pa'i gzugs ma yin te/ ljang gu dang nag po dang dkar po'i tshul gyis zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas zhes pa ni don dam par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pas dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med par rtogs pa'i phyir de ltar na zhal gsum pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid mi bskyod pa la sogs
<p>52a.5</p>pa rnams ci'i rang bzhin yin/ des na mar me shi ba bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes pa'i gdul bya rnams kyi mar me lta bu'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i mngon par zhen pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o/ /stong pa nyid gang sgom par byed pa yin na stobs bcu la sogs pa 'phags pa'i chos mngon sum du gyur te/ 
<p>52a.6</p>de ni chos rnams kyi dbyings ni rgyu ste/ 'phags pa'i chos kyi rgyu yin phyir/ /zhes pas so/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams stong pa nyid du ro gcig pa de'i bdag nyid yin te/ mA ma kI la sogs pa'i glus de kho na nyid las bskul ba'i rjes la zla ba zhu ba rang gi sa bon dang mtshan ma las grub pa mi bskyod
<p>52a.7</p>pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi skur byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir mar me dang 'dra ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa spong bas bstan par bya ba'i phyir sngags yin no/ /chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs par/ /gang zhig chos yod ma yin no/ /zhes pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings
<p>52b</p>
<p>52b.1</p>kyi rang bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid gang la yod pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i de ltar de nga yin no zhes/ gnyis med dngos ni dngos med pa'i/ /dngos po stong pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /zhes stong pa'i rang bzhin gyi mi bskyod pa la sogs pa yod pa'i phyir cis na me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das
<p>52b.2</p>pa'i skabs yod ces don dam par skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' med par gsungs so/ /skabs su bab pa'i las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la brten pa'i sems dbang du bya ba'i don du phra mo'i rnal 'byor gyi bsgom pa gsungs pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i kha dog go/ /chen po de yang de chos kyi dbyings
<p>52b.3</p>kyi ngo bo des dngos po ma lus pa rnams la khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /zag pa med pa'i dga' ba rgyas par byed pas rin po che'o/ /sna'i rtse mo ni rang gi rig ma'i chu skyes kyi ze'u 'brur ro/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni shes rab dang thabs kyi snyoms par 'jug pas so/ /rtag pa ni ji srid du sems dbang du ma gyur pa de
<p>52b.4</p>srid du'o/ /bstan pa nyid ni bstan pa'i mtshan ma lnga po thob na spro bar bya ste gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /'khor lo dang rdo rje dang rin po che ni rtsa ba'i phyag mtshan rnams te go rims ji lta bar rnam par snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa dang rin chen tog gang yin pa rnams kyi'o/ /pad+ma dang shugs can mchog
<p>52b.5</p>ni mtshon cha ste 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa'i ste/ de bzhin du brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po bstan pa rnams kyi 'khor lo'i kha dog gi nges pa gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings ni sngar bzhin no/ /rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa yin te de'i phyag mtshan yin pa'i phyir nye bar gdags pas so/ /de'i kha
<p>52b.6</p>dog gi dkyil 'khor te bri bar bya ba ni bsgom par bya'o/ /gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni shel dang 'dra ba ste 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad do/ /pad+ma ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o/ /de'i kha dog gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /de 'dra ba ni yang dag par ston pas so/ /rin chen ni rin chen tog ste de'i kha dog yin la
<p>52b.7</p>de'i rin po che la gtso bor byed pa ste mngon par mos pa'o/ /de bzhin du don yod grub pa'i kha dog ni de'i dkyil 'khor yin te 'di mtshon par byed pa yin pa'i phyir de kun la yang blta bar bya'o/ /sbyor ba las zhes pa ni thabs dang shes rab kyi snyoms par 'jug pa las yang dag par byung ba ste/ 
<p>53a</p>
<p>53a.1</p>dkyil 'khor gang yin pa de ni sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba bri bar bya ba ni bsgom par bya ba ste/ nam mkha' dang nye ba'i nam mkha'i yul du'o/ /'di skad du brjod par 'gyur te sa yongs su gzung ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgoms te
<p>53a.2</p>sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi'i cha nam mkha' dang mnyam par mngon par bsgoms te 'khor lo bri bar bya'o zhes pa'o/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo bteg nas ni/ /zhes bzang po'i zhabs kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /'di nyid mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa
<p>53a.3</p>la sogs par mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las dam pa yin te/ shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid dri ma med pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshogs pa'i khyad par gang yin zhe na/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams sprul pa la sogs pa'i gzugs rnams sgrub par
<p>53a.4</p>byed pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bos mngon sum du byed pas so/ /dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor ba'o/ /rgyu lnga dang ni rig pa dang / /rdo rje ru ni brjod pa yin/ /zhes pas rdo rje las byung ba'o/ /thams cad gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bo'i shes par byed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa ste
<p>53a.5</p>de'i bdag nyid do/ /dkar po la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams ni de'i rnam pa'i gdul bya'i dbang gis te de thob pa ni de'i dbang du gyur pa yin no/ /dngos po mtha' dag rig yod min/ /tshad mas ma grub pa yi phyir/ /yod na'ang mi yi rwa sogs pa'ang / /yod par thal bar 'gyur phyir ro/ /
<p>53a.6</p>gal te kun mkhyen 'di yod na/ /kho bo cag sogs kyis mthong 'gyur/ /ma mthong phyir na rtogs med phyir/ /yod par ci ltar rjes su dpog /sgrub byed gnod byed med pa'i phyir/ /khyod la the tshom nyid yod do/ /smra phyir med pa yin zhe na/ /ma yin ma sogs med par 'gyur/ /de
<p>53a.7</p>grub nyer bstan las she na/ /kho bo'i thams cad mkhyen de'ang mtshungs/ /ma ni spyi ru grub ce na/ /dang po nyid du ma nges yin/ /smra ba la ni rtogs pas khyab/ /de yi yul ni don med yin/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'ang don yod yin/ /'gal bas khyab phyir de ma yin/ /gang gis kun mkhyen
<p>53b</p>
<p>53b.1</p>tshig ni 'dod/ /de tshe des ni nyams myong min/ /gang tshe myong yod de yod min/ /de phyir med sgrub grub sgrub yin/ /yang na goms phyir nyal ba na/ /tshig nyid rtog pa med par yod/ /sems yengs pa na kha ton bzhin/ /rmi lam sogs la rtog pa med/ /yang dag dran nyid bstan ched du/ /
<p>53b.2</p>ma dpyad par ni 'dir mi gsung / /zhes brjod phal cher du ni tshig /mi yi rnam rtog rjes su 'brang / /sangs rgyas rtag tu mnyam gzhag ste/ /gzhan du grub pa ma yin no/ /gang las thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshig /kun mkhyen ye shes sngon 'gro yin/ /des na yod pa ma bkag ste/ /
<p>53b.3</p>mi rnams the tshom bya ba'i rigs/ /thams cad mkhyen bsgrub tshad ma ni/ /gang tshe nges pa nyid na'ang yin/ /rnam pa kun ni yongs mkhyen pa/ /med par de yi tshig ma yin/ /skad cig sogs kyi tshig 'di ni/ /dngos po de nyid ston byed yin/ /des na rgyu 'dis rtag grub min/ /yang na
<p>53b.4</p>the tshom za ba yin/ /skye gnyis la sogs tha dad las/ /de yi rigs sogs nges ma yin/ /rnam sogs dbang las yin zhe na/ /ma yin g.yung sogs la mthong bas/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i khyad par la/ /goms pa'i rtags ni srid pa yin/ /chos can ma grub sogs skyon gang / /
<p>53b.5</p>ma yin skyes bu tsam grub phyir/ /gang tshig de nyid ston byed pa/ /de nyid kho bo'i bde gshegs yin/ /tshad mas gnod pa'i bdag la sogs/ /ston byed lung ni mthong bas so/ /dbang phyug la sogs kun mkhyen min/ /'gal bas khyad par mthong ba'i phyir/ /rig byed las ni bstan
<p>53b.6</p>pas 'di/ /de nyid ce na bkag phyir min/ /rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa las/ /skyes bu'i tshig tu grub pa yin/ /rgyu med gcig tu skye ma yin/ /rtag tu yod sogs thal 'gyur phyir/ /rig byed tshig gi bdag nyid phyir/ /nges par skyes bus byas pa yin/ /rig byed khyad par can tshig ce/ /
<p>53b.7</p>ma yin khyad par ma grub phyir/ /rtogs dka'i khyad par yod ce na/ /de ni kla klo sogs la'ang mtshungs/ /tshad mas 'grub pa'i de nyid ni/ /gang zhig ston de kun mkhyen yin/ /gzhan du yong shes thub pa la/ /tshu rol mthong ba the tshom za/ /tshad ma gnyis kyi yul ni grub/ /'ga' la
<p>54a</p>
<p>54a.1</p>rang gis kyang mi gnod/ /lung gi tshad yin dbang sogs min/ /'di 'dra 'di la dpag ma yin/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spros pas gsal ba'i phyir/ gsal ba de nyid rdo rje bkod pa yin no/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan gyi le'u gsum pa'o// //
<p>54a.2</p>de nas zhes pa ni dbang bskur ba dang rjes su gnang ba dang sdom pa la sogs pa'i yongs su bzung ba med par grub la de yang dkyil 'khor med par ma yin te/ dkyil 'khor dman par gyur pa dang / /dam tshig spangs par gyur pa ni/ /sgrub thabs cung zhig mi 'grub ste/ /gsang ba'i de nyid
<p>54a.3</p>mi shes phyir/ /zhes dpal sangs rgyas thams cad las gsungs pa dang / ri mo'i dkyil 'khor yang ma bstan no zhes gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su chod pa'i rjes la'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o/ /yang zhes pa ni le'u dang po'i
<p>54a.4</p>'dus pa la ltos nas so/ /las dang po pa'i slob dpon yang sngar bsnyen pa byas pa dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pas mtshan ma thob pas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pa'i bdag po'i rnal 'byor pa rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa la de 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang
<p>54a.5</p>mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa slob ma rnams shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir gnas pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba gdab pa gsungs pa/ kun zhes te bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag pa'i phyir zhi ba'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir de
<p>54a.6</p>bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gnas so/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gi phyir chos thams cad kyi mchog bdag med pa dang stong pa nyid kyi bdag nyid de yin pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no/ /bshad pa ni ston cig pa'o/ /bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams las mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras
<p>54a.7</p>bu thob pa'i phyir dam pa yin te thun mong ba'i gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /gru bzhi la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i phyir/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /sbom pa dang phra ba dang yon po'i ri mo'i skyon dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan min thams cad spangs pa'o/ /kye kun du bzang
<p>54b</p>
<p>54b.1</p>po zhes te sku ni sku rdo rje ste mchog go/ /'dir de bshad du gsol zhes te sku'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /zhi ba'i chos ni stobs bcu la sogs pa ste mchog de 'dir yin pas de skad ces bya'o/ /so sor kun du rtog pa'i ye shes de las byung ba'o/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya
<p>54b.2</p>ba'i phyir spyod pa ni ye shes spyod pa'o/ /de'i thabs sna tshogs pa'i ngo bos yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'o/ /gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /zil gyis mi non bzlog pa med/ /dpa' bo rnams ni 'gyur srid de/ /bde ba chen po rab 'phel phyir/ /zhes gsungs pas so/ /gsung ni
<p>54b.3</p>gsung rdo rje'o/ /'dir mchog bshad du gsol zhes te gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi chen po yang yin te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bos dngos po ma lus pa la khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /sems kyang yin te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa'o/ /dag pa ni bag
<p>54b.4</p>chags dang bcas par gnyi ga yang spangs pa'o/ /ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang las rang bzhin gyis dri ma med pa'o/ /thugs ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste mchog go/ /gang du de bshad du gsol zhes so/ /kha lo sgyur ba ni lam gyi bden pa'i shing rta yis rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob par byed pa'i thugs
<p>54b.5</p>kyi dkyil 'khor la gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /nyon mongs pa'i dgra sel bar byed pas na ston pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bos sa 'og dang sa stengs dang sa bla'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir 'jig rten gsum mo/ /'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rang bzhin yin pas khams gsum
<p>54b.6</p>pa'o/ /'jig rten gsum na mchog yin pa ni phyi rol pa dang slob pa dang mi slob pa de rnams las so/ /rdo rje ni stong pa nyid yin te ye shes lnga la sogs pa'i ngo bos gtso bo'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir 'di rnams 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog ston pa'o/ /mthong ba tsam gyis yang gdul bya'i yid 'phrog
<p>54b.7</p>par byed pa'i phyir nyams dga' ba'o/ /byang chub chen po'i thugs kyi rgyu mthun pa yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs so/ /bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba yang 'dir zur bzhi la sogs pa'i rnam pa yin pas de bzhin du'o/ /de nas zhes pa ni bsnyen pa
<p>55a</p>
<p>55a.1</p>byas pas mtshan ma thob pa'i rjes la'o/ /gang gi phyir dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa med na grub pa med pa'i rgyus so/ /rab tu phye nas bshad par bya'o/ /thugs gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab 'dra ba ni ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang 'dra
<p>55a.2</p>ba ste/ rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan mtshungs pa'i phyir la dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i lha rnams kyi/ 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba las/ /brtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra bar/ /bris pa la yang de bzhin no/ /zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /thugs gtso bo yin na yang sku dang
<p>55a.3</p>gsung med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ro/ /sar pa ni dkyil 'khor gzhan la ma spyad pas so/ /legs bkal ba ni nyi shu rtsa lngar phye bas so/ /legs pa'i tshad 'khor lo las nyis 'gyur gyi ring ba dang sgo'i nyi shu cha'i sbom pa'o/ /mdzes pa ni mdud
<p>55a.4</p>pa med pa dang mi lhod pas so/ /shes rab can ni mkhas pa ste bde bar gshegs pa'i tshig des rtogs pa'i phyir ro/ /khru bcu gnyis zhes pa ni grangs kyi tshad kyis gdul bya rjes su gzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/ /de nges pa ni ma yin te/ khru gang las ni brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid
<p>55a.5</p>khru ni stong gi bar/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /gru bzhi ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kyi ri mo dang ldan pa'o/ /grwa ni mtshams kyi ri mo gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/ /sgo bzhi ni dkyil 'khor gyi brgyad kyi cha gang du yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o/ /zur bzhi pa de'i phyed kyi tshad kyis
<p>55a.6</p>yongs su bskor ba ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes pa'i rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /thig la sogs pa'i cho ga 'di yang rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa dang bzang po zhabs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las shes par bya ste/ 'dir ni btags pa la 'thag pas ci zhig bya ste gzhung mangs pas
<p>55a.7</p>'jigs pas ma bris so/ /de nyid kyi phyir las kyi cho ga mthong ba zhes gsungs te/ rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i cho gas so/ /phyag rgya ni phyag mtshan rnams dgod par bya ba yin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnams ni ma yin te/ mu stegs can la phan gdags phyir/ /sangs rgyas btsun
<p>55b</p>
<p>55b.1</p>mo sbas pa yin/ /zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bstan pas thos pa dang mi ldan pa rnams ma dad pas bcom ldan 'das la skur pa 'debs par mi 'gyur ba'i ched du las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis zhes gzhan no/ /las kyi cho ga mthong ba las bstan pa'i/ /so so'i 'byin pa'i sngags
<p>55b.2</p>kyis dgod par bya/ /zhes gzhan dag go/ /de'i dbus ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ste dbus kyi re'u mig la'o/ /rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'o/ /shar phyogs su chen po ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /'khor lo ni rtsibs brgyad pa dkar po ste rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o/ /rdo rje 'bar
<p>55b.3</p>bas rnam par brgyan pa ni nye bar mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir rdo rje 'bar bas so/ /'di yang thams cad kyi phyag mtshan rnams kyi khyad par ro/ /rin chen chen po lho phyogs su zhes pa ni ljang gu cha dgu pa ste rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o/ /nub phyogs su snang ba mtha' yas kyi pad+ma'o/ /byang gi
<p>55b.4</p>le tshe la don yod grub pa'i ral gri ljang gu'o/ /me ru spyan gyi dbus na sprin dang 'dra ba ni spyan ma'o/ /bden bral du mA ma kI'i rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa'o/ /rigs ni mi bskyod pa yin la de las byung ba'o/ /rlung du gos dkar mo'i pad+ma dmar po'o/ /dbang ldan gyi re'u mig la sgrol ma'i
<p>55b.5</p>ut+pal ser po'o/ /phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi zur dang shar gyi sgo'i ngos gnyis su go rims ci lta bar/ me long pi wang dung dang ni/ /de bzhin snod dang sna tshogs gos/ /chos 'byung ba yi phyag rgya drug /'khor lo'i bdag po rdo rje can/ /zhes rgyud phyi ma las mtshan ma drug po rnams
<p>55b.6</p>gsungs so/ /shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su tho ba sngon po dang / dbyig pa dkar po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / kha gyes pa'i rdo rje sngon po rnams ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa rnams kyis so/ /gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa dang rtag pa bor ba'i mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de
<p>55b.7</p>bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams la'o/ /lhag ma rnams kyi phyag mtshan ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la bri bar bya'o/ /de nyid kyi phyir kha gyes pa'i rdo rje bshad pa'i don du rdo rje 'di yin te/ snying po brtan zhing khong stong med/ /stong pa nyid la rdo rjer brjod/ /ces te stong pa
<p>56a</p>
<p>56a.1</p>nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir dang / 'khyil pa yang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yin te/ rdo rje can gyi yang mtshan ma de yin pas gang de'i khro bo rdo rje zhes khyad par du gsungs so/ /des na sna tshogs rdo rje dang rdo rje gnyis dgod do zhes pa ni mi rigs so/ /yongs su gsal ba ni rnam
<p>56a.2</p>pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'i thugs kyi bdag po'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /mchod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i bsdus pa'i tshig rnam par spros nas gsungs pa yin te/ lo bcu drug lon pa ni mtshon par byed pa yin pas nyung ba dang lhag pa yang gzung bar bya ste/ dud 'gro las kyang rab tu brtag /
<p>56a.3</p>ces gsungs pa'i phyir ro/ /bco lnga par bshad pa'i btsun mo zhe sdang gi rigs kyi bu mo yin te/ de'i dbus su zhes pa ni de dang nye ba'i yul du'o/ /byin gyis brlabs pa ni yan lag bzhi pa'i rim pas mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pas byin gyis brlab bo/ /de zhes pa ni/ mchog
<p>56a.4</p>tu dad cing shes rab che/ /gzugs bzang sgrub pa po la dga'/ /sbyor ba gcig gi bya ba goms/ /dam tshig dag gi dam tshig can/ /zhes rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so/ /phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes/ /sngags dang rgyud ni legs par bslabs/ /zhes bcu drug pa las kyang
<p>56a.5</p>gsungs so/ /mA ma kI zhes te de dang 'dra ba'i mi bskyod pa'i rang 'od kyi shes rab po/ /yon tan ni stobs bcu la sogs pa'i gang gi ska rags yin pa de ni de bzhin no/ /spro bar bya zhes pa ni rang 'od kyi shes rab kyi pad+mo'i lte ba la gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas ni mi bskyod pa yin te gnas
<p>56a.6</p>ni dkyil 'khor ro/ /bag chags dang bcas pa'i gnyis kyi sgrib pa spangs pa'i phyir zhi ba'o/ /nam mkha'i dbyings de ni gnas pa'i sems can gang gi brgyan pa de dag gang gis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su byas pa ste/ rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la rang ji lta ba spros te bstim par bya'o/ /bshang ba
<p>56a.7</p>zhes pa la sogs pas/ /bshang gci sha khrag sems byung gzhan/ /ba lang khyi glang rta mi lnga/ /zhes te ci ltar srid par te/ /tha mal lus kyi chos rnams las/ /dri ma lnga rnams snang ba ni/ /ye shes lnga yis byin brlab phyir/ /bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya bar dran/ /sbar dang bsreg pa nyid dang ni/ /rnam par byed dang
<p>56b</p>
<p>56b.1</p>gzugs gsal ba/ /sngags kyi lus kyi sbyor ba yis/ /bdud rtsi lnga yi bdud rtsi bzang / /rdo rje hUM las byung ba ni/ /bar snang la gnas bsam par bya/ /AHlas byung ba'i pad+ma ni/ /de yi 'og tu bsgom par bya/ /oM gyis mtshan pa'i bdud rtsi lnga/ /de yi dbus su gzhug par bya/ /
<p>56b.2</p>rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /'bar bas tshim bya rnal 'byor pas/ /bsal bya shel gyi rnam par ro/ /ye shes nyi ma gzhan du 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams rnams las/ /mtshon cha mchog gis drangs nas ni/ /bdud rtsi de ru phab byas nas/ /bza' ba'i sbyor bas bza'
<p>56b.3</p>bar bya/ /bsgrub bya'i dngos grub cho ga yis/ /de bzhin dpa' bo lnga rnams bza'/ /yig gsum sa bon las bskyed bya/ /gzhan du de nyid 'grub mi 'gyur/ /zhes rgyud phyi ma'i cho gas grub pa'i dngul chus zangs gser du byed pa'i tshul du ye shes kyi bdud rtsir gyur pa nye bar spyod pa gsungs
<p>56b.4</p>so/ /mos pa spyad pa'i sa la gnas pa'i las dang po pas kyang shes rab kyi rjes su dag pa'i dad pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i rnal 'byor pa mos pa yid la byed pas kyang dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa'i mngon par byang chub pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rgyur gyur pa bza' bar bya ba'i
<p>56b.5</p>dam tshig phyung nas sngags kyi byed pa la sogs pa'i nus pa'i rgyu nyid do/ /gang yang rgyud rig 'ga' zhig gis/ /gsang sngags cung zad byed gyur pa/ /de dag gi ni gtso bo'i mthu/ /de bshad rigs pa 'jug phyir ro/ /zhes rnam 'grel las so/ /ci ste dbye bar mi 'gyur bar/ /thams
<p>56b.6</p>cad yang dag bsdus nas bya/ /gal te de ni byed gyur na/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi 'grub po/ /sngags pa chen pos legs sbas pas/ /'bad pa nyid kyis bsgom par bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig ye shes blo ldan gyis/ /zhes gnyis su med pa'i rnam par
<p>56b.7</p>rgyal ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas so/ /rgyud phyi ma'i rim pas kyang byin gyis brlabs te/ thun mong cig shos dngos grub ni/ /tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba yin/ /mnyes pa ni thugs rje chen po nyid kyis gzhan gyi don gzigs pas phas bu'i don mthong ba bzhin no/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
<p>57a</p>
<p>57a.1</p>khams na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' de rnams ni snyan pa chen po'o/ /de skad du yang gsungs pa/ de nas rnal 'byor dam tshig mchog /gzugs dang lang tsho yon tan ldan/ /sbyor byas slob dpon der 'dug nas/ /ye shes dbab pas rab tu brtag /
<p>57a.2</p>rdo rjes pad+ma kha phye la/ /sangs rgyas rab snang gzhug par bya/ /pad+ma la gnas bstan bya ste/ /rigs bdag las gnang thob pa dang / /rdo rje'i bdag nyid rang ming brjod/ /'khor lo'i sbyor bas spro bar bya/ /rdo rje chu skyes sgras sangs rgyas/ /'khor lo'i nang du spyan drangs te/ /bgegs
<p>57a.3</p>rnams bsal la yang dag bsrung / /mchod yon phul nas yang mchod bya/ /yang dag bstod de sgo bas sgor/ /las rnams byas nas bsgrub par bya/ /mig dang sku sogs byin brlabs la/ /dbang bskur mchod pa la sogs brtag /dngos grub byin phyir sems can don/ /mdzod
<p>57a.4</p>cig par ni gsol ba gdab/ /dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgyan gyi le'u bzhi pa'o// //de nas zhes te dam tshig dang sdom pa ma brjod la de ma blangs na yang dngos grub med do/ /gtum po la sogs pa gang rnams dang mtshams med pa lnga byed pa la sogs pa yang sdig pa chen po byed pa
<p>57a.5</p>rnams theg pa gzhan dang rgyud gzhan las spangs te ci de rnams kyang 'dir skabs yod dam med ces gdul bya'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su shes pa'i rjes la'o/ /rgyal bar byed cing gsal bar byed pas na rgyal po'o/ /kun mchog ni phyi rol pa dang slob pa la sogs pa rnams las phul du byung
<p>57a.6</p>ba'o/ /rgyal ba thams cad skyed par byed pa yin pas gnas ni dkyil 'khor te der dbang phyug go/ /spyod pa kun ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rnam pa bcu po dkar po'i yon tan gyi ngo bo lam la gnas pa'o/ /chos kyi mchog ni bse ru dang nyan thos dang thun mong ma yin pa'i stobs bcu la
<p>57a.7</p>sogs pa rnams 'bras bu la gnas pa yin te don ni dgos pa'o/ /ston pa'i gnas skabs na gang gi brjod par bya ba de ston par byed pa ste sngags kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin no/ /rnam par mi rtog pa don du gnyer bas na don te/ shes rab dang thabs kyi rang bzhin dri ma med pa bde ba
<p>57b</p>
<p>57b.1</p>chen po'i rnam pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te de las byung ba ni/ mchod pa chen po chags pa che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /ces pas 'dod chags kyang yin no/ /mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che/ /nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba/ /zhes pas zhe sdang yang yin no/ /
<p>57b.2</p>mchod pa chen po gti mug che/ /gti mug blo ste gti mug sel/ /zhes pas gti mug yang yin no/ /de'i rang bzhin 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mi bskyod pa dang rnam par snang mdzad rnams shes rab dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin te rigs ni rtags nges par brjod pa ma yin te/ 'jig rten
<p>57b.3</p>na yang rigs mi gnas pas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ba rnams so/ /de rnams dang de'i rnal 'byor pa yang rang dang gzhan gyi rgyud la sgrub par byed de/ bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi mchog rab tu sgrub par byed pas dngos grub ste thun mong ba dang cig shos
<p>57b.4</p>so/ /theg pa'i mchog ni dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam gyi ngo bo'o/ /gang gi phyir 'di las mchog med pas bla na med pa yin te/ rten pa zhes kha bskang bar bya'o/ /bram ze la sogs pa'i rigs ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin te zhes le'u gsum pa'i mthar thams cad mkhyen
<p>57b.5</p>pa sgrub pa'i tshad mas bshad do/ /las kyi stobs nyid las dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog gi skye ba ni tha snyad las yin te/ des na rigs kyi stobs las ni dngos grub bsgrub pa ma yin no/ /'on kyang ji ltar gyur pa'i lam thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis yin te
<p>57b.6</p>gdul bya'i ngo bo nyid kyis gzhan dag tu bshad pa yin la rigs la sogs pa'i nges pas ni ma yin te/ nI tha la sogs pa yang skye ba dman pa rab tu 'byung ba la sogs pa thos pa de'i phyir gsungs so/ /gtum po smyig ma mkhan la sogs/ /grub 'gyur nyid ces te nyid ni nges par
<p>57b.7</p>gzung ba'i don to/ /gang la brten pa yin zhe na/ gsungs pa mchog la ste/ 'jig rten pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams las gong du gyur pa ni theg pa chen po'o/ /de 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lam mo/ /de la yang bla na med pa dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i
<p>58a</p>
<p>58a.1</p>lam 'di la'o/ /nyid ni gang gi phyir te bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las bkag pa skye ba dang las dman pa dang sdig pa chen po byed pas kyang sdig pa bshags pa'i rim pas 'dir gzung bar bya ba nyid do/ /gsod pa nyid don te dgos pa'o/ /des na don ni gson pa la phan
<p>58a.2</p>pa'i sems pa ste yang zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba dang 'brel to/ /dgra bcom pa dang ma dang pha gsod pa dang dge 'dun gyi dbyen byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa yang yin te/ lnga po ni shi ma thag tu dmyal bar skye ba la bar bcad par mi nus pa'i phyir mtshams
<p>58a.3</p>med pa ste sdig pa'i las rnams so/ /de la sogs pa ste sdig pa chen po'i las rnams gang rnams kyis sdig pa chen po byas pa de rnams thams cad nyid kyang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i lam theg pa chen po'i mchog bsgrub pa 'di la dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la sogs pa'i rim pas gnas
<p>58a.4</p>te yod pa'o/ /snying rje dang shes rab goms pa la shin tu nus pas sems pa rnams so/ /shes rab thabs dang ldan pa rnams/ /dam tshig nga yis rjes su bstan/ /zhes brjod pas so/ /snga ma dang phyi ma yang 'di'i dbang du byas te blta bar bya'o/ /yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa
<p>58a.5</p>yin yang bcos su med pa gang yin zhe na/ snying nas slob dpon smod pa dag /bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ /slob dpon smod pa yang phas pham pa dang po'i ltung ba yin te/ de dang ldan pa rnams ta la'i mgo bcad pa dang 'dra ba ci'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba'i myu gu bskyed pa'i skabs
<p>58a.6</p>yod/ gang gis de sngon du song ba'i thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ gal te slar de rnams kyis kyang bla ma la ji ltar 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas te dkyil 'khor de la/ byang chub sems ni gzung bar bya/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro la sogs sdom/ /zhes pas ltung ba
<p>58a.7</p>yang dag par bsdus pa'i cho gas phyir bcos pa bya ste/ de'i tshe dngos grub kyi snod nyid du 'gyur bar snying nas zhes smras so/ /bla ma mnyes pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan du min zhes thub pas gsungs/ /zhes brjod pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar yang dam tshig dang sdom pa la gnas pas thun mong dang
<p>58b</p>
<p>58b.1</p>cig shos grub kyi gzhan ni ma yin pas sems can zhes pa la sogs pa nas gang zhes pa'i bar gyis bsrung ba'i dam tshig bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin te/ snying rje dang shes rab dang ldan pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /bdag che ge mo
<p>58b.2</p>zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po yis/ /byang chub tu ni nges mdzad ltar/ /byang chub sems ni bla na med/ /dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bya/ /sdom pa yi ni tshul khrims dang / /dge ba'i chos sdud tshul khrims
<p>58b.3</p>dang / /sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum/ /brtan par bdag gis gzung bar bgyi/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang / /dkon mchog gsum po bla med mchog /sdom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor skyes/ /deng nas bzung ste brtsom par bgyi/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang / /
<p>58b.4</p>de nyid kyis ni gzung bar bgyi/ /rdo rje chen po'i rigs chen la/ /slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi/ /nyin re nyin re lan drug tu/ /sbyin pa rnam bzhi sbyin par bgyi/ /rin chen rigs mchog chen po la/ /dam tshig yid du 'ong ba yis/ /phyi dang gsang dang theg pa gsum/ /
<p>58b.5</p>dam tshig yongs su gzung bar bgyi/ /pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag la/ /byang chub chen po las byung ba/ /sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan/ /de nyid kyis ni gzung bar bgyi/ /mchod pa'i las ni ci nus pa/ /las kyi rigs ni chen po la/ /byang chub sems ni bla med pa/ /dam
<p>58b.6</p>pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi/ /ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi/ /ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol/ /dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ste/ /mya ngan 'das la sems can dgod/ /ces pas thun
<p>58b.7</p>mong gi sdom pa blangs pa sngon du song ba smon lam btab pa yin no/ /ma dad smra ba'i sems can dang / /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / /gdug pa'i sems can gzhan la yang / /las 'dis bskul bar bya ba yin/ /zhes bcu gsum pa'i tshig gis dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song du 'gro
<p>59a</p>
<p>59a.1</p>ba'i rgyu'i las la zhugs pa'i sdang ba rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su dpag nas snying rje'i dbang du song ba'i sems nyid kyis btang snyoms su bzhag par mi nus pa yin te/ de'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las bzlog pa'i ched dang bla na med pa'i
<p>59a.2</p>byang chub la gzhag pa'i don du yang de 'dra ba'i thabs gzhan ma mthong bas dgu par bshad pa'i tshogs mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas de dag dam tshig la gzhug pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba dang so sor snang ba thob pa/ kha sbyar dbye ba la sogs pa nyams su blang ba'i
<p>59a.3</p>bya bas nyi ma so sor thun mtshams bzhir rang goms pa'i ma tshang ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsum dang ldan pas thun mtshams bar ma la bsgrub par bya'o/ /bshang gci zhes pa la sogs pas/ /bshang gci sha khrag rigs byung gzhan/ /ba lang khyi glang rta mi lnga/ /zhes rgyud phyi ma'i cho gas bza' bar
<p>59a.4</p>bya ba'i dam tshig gnyis mtshon pa yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa/ dam tshig gsang ba bsgrag par bya/ /srog chags zhes pa nas ji srid btsun mo zhes pa'i bar du le'u bcu drug pa las so/ /dam tshig rnam bzhi bsrung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od/ /ces
<p>59a.5</p>pa nas/ sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams/ /dam tshig chen po rmad byung ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi brtan pa ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis bsrung bya/ /gang zhig dam tshig 'di srung ba/ /rdo rje sems dpa' 'od chen po/ /de yi sku gsung thugs gyur pa/ /de ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /zhes bcu
<p>59a.6</p>bdun pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar yang dpal de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ ji lta ji ltar gdul bya bar/ /sems can rang bzhin gyis gyur pa/ /de lta de ltar sems can don/ /'dod chags sogs kyis dag par byed/ /sems can kun la phan phyir dang / /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i
<p>59a.7</p>rgyu yi phyir/ /sems can thams cad gsod byed pa/ /de ni sdig pas gos ma yin/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /sangs rgyas dgongs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzhan gyi nor rnams 'phrog pa ni/ /de ni sdig pas gos ma yin/ /'dod chags dang mtshungs bde ba med/ /rgyal ba
<p>59b</p>
<p>59b.1</p>rnams la ster byed pa/ /sems can don du gzhan bud med/ /bsten na bsod nams 'thob par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la phan don du/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyu yi phyir/ /las ni thams cad bya ba nyid/ /bsod nams mang po skye bar 'gyur/ /zhes smos so/ /de nyid kyi
<p>59b.2</p>phyir bzang po zhabs kyis/ /dam tshig bsrung ba'i bdag po yin/ /rtag tu sdom pa bskyang bar bya/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi rnam lnga bza'/ /dam tshig gzhan yang bsrung bar bya/ /dkon mchog gnod gzhom bud med kun/ /gzhan rdzas len pa brdzun gyi tshig /'di dag cho ga bzhin
<p>59b.3</p>bsrung ba/ /rnal 'byor rgyud la'ang gang bshad pa'o/ /lam ma yin pa 'di nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam gyi dam tshig tu ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/ snying rje dang shes rab dang ldan pas gzhan gyi don la gcig tu brtan pa phyin ci ma log pa de'i bla na med pa'i byang chub la lhan
<p>59b.4</p>cig byed pa'i rgyu nyid yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gsungs pa/ yang dag rtog las byang sems rnams/ /dge ba'am yang na mi dge ba/ /'di dag thams cad dge ba ste/ /gang las de rnams yid dbang 'gyur/ /zhes so/ /'bras bu bskal pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa las
<p>59b.5</p>rtogs par bya ba yin na lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu nyid kyang ma grub bo zhe na/ de ltar na yang sbyin pa la sogs pa de yang ma grub pas de la yang 'jug par mi 'gyur bar thal bar 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa la sogs pa dngos po'i rang bzhin du gyur pa yang mtho ris dang thar pa thob pa la sogs par nus pa la
<p>59b.6</p>the tshom du rigs te de'i 'bras bu de ma thag pa med pa'i phyir nges par bya ba la mi sgrin pa'i phyir dang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de nyid kyi phyir 'di dgag par bya ba'i ched du/ mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag dang / /gnyis pos kyang ni mi gnod pa/ /'di yi mthong dang ma mthong la/ /de don de la mi slu
